util
Class DataSet

java.lang.Object
  util.DataSet
Direct Known Subclasses:
RDFDataSet, SesameDataSet, SPARQLDataSet
public abstract class DataSet
extends Object

Abstract class managing a data set from any origin.

Version:
04042012
Author:
Thibaud Colas
See Also:
RepositoryConnection

Field Summary

          Connection to the data set's repository.
protected static Logger LOG
          Logger to record actions on the data set.

          Data set name for display.
protected  LinkedList<String> queries
          History of all the queries submited to the data set.

          Repository where the data is stored.

addAllStatements

public final void addAllStatements(Iterable<Statement> statements)
                            throws RepositoryException
Adds a set of statements to the repository.

Parameters:
statements - : The statements to add.
Throws:
RepositoryException - Repository not writable.

addNamespace

public final void addNamespace(String prefix,
                               String uri)
                        throws RepositoryException
Adds a namespace to the repository.

Parameters:
prefix - : Namespaces' prefix.
uri - : Namespaces' full name.
Throws:
RepositoryException - If the new binding fails (repository unwritable).

addStatement

public final void addStatement(Statement statement)
                        throws RepositoryException
Adds a single statement to the repository.

Parameters:
statement - : The statement.
Throws:
RepositoryException - Repository not writable.

addTuples

public void addTuples(String path,
                      String prefix,
                      String baseuri)
               throws RepositoryException,
                      RDFParseException,
                      IOException
Adds given file(s) to the repository.

Parameters:
path - : Path to the given folder/file.
prefix - : String to filter filenames with.
baseuri - : Base URI for the new data.
Throws:
IOException - If the submitted filepath isn't usable.
RDFParseException - If the RDF data inside the file(s) isn't well-formed.
RepositoryException - Internal repository error.

Commits all of the changes which have not been commited yet.

getAllStatements

public final LinkedList<Statement> getAllStatements()
                                             throws RepositoryException
Gives all of the statements inside the repository.

Returns:
A linked list containing all the statements.
Throws:
RepositoryException - Problem during retrieval.

getAllStatements

public final LinkedList<Statement> getAllStatements(Resource subject,
                                                    URI predicate)
                                             throws RepositoryException
Recovers statements according to criteria.

Parameters:
subject - : The subject we want to use.
predicate - : The predicat to use.
Returns:
Statements which have r as subject and u as predicat.
Throws:
RepositoryException - Problem during retrieval.

Retrieves the last query sent to the data set.

selectQuery

public TupleQueryResult selectQuery(String query)
                             throws RepositoryException,
                                    MalformedQueryException,
                                    QueryEvaluationException
Sends and evaluates a SPARQL select query on the data set.

Parameters:
query - : The SPARQL query without its prefixes.
Returns:
The result of the query.
Throws:
MalformedQueryException - Query isn't valid.
RepositoryException - Error while accessing the repository.
QueryEvaluationException - Query result isn't valid.

setAutoCommit

public final void setAutoCommit(boolean status)
Sets auto commit (i.e one commit for each update) on or off.

Parameters:
status - : Autocommit status.

public void setLoggingLevel(Level level)
Allows to set the logging level for this component.

Parameters:
level - : The logging level.

shutdown

public final void shutdown()
Stops properly the connection to the repository and shuts down the repository itself.

updateQuery

public void updateQuery(String query)
                 throws RepositoryException,
                        UpdateExecutionException,
                        MalformedQueryException
Sends an update (delete/insert) SPARQL query to the data set.

Parameters:
query - : The SPARQL query without its prefixes.
Throws:
MalformedQueryException - Query isn't valid.
RepositoryException - Error while accessing the repository.
UpdateExecutionException - Query update isn't valid.
